description.text: Romance Tourism encompasses trips made by couples and families to celebrate a special occasion in their lives, such as: vow renewals, bachelor and bachelorette parties, wedding ring ceremonies, honeymoons, anniversaries, babymoons, remarriage, familymoons and, most notably, destination weddings and elopements.
The favorite destinations for couples are our beautiful beaches, although younger generations have been increasingly drawn to colonial and adventure destinations.
Mexico has integrated artisans, designers, traditional cooks, etc., into its local population, with the aim of promoting social development with a gender perspective and inclusion.
We invite you to fall in love with Mexico and dare you to experience it yourself.
